text: Anyone know if there’s any way to tap into and utilize HubSpot’s geolocation detection? i.e. add the user’s country as a class on body or an attribute on html?

Depends on the use-case, but there’s likely a more elegant way of approaching it. I’d try to use smart content as much as possible in order to avoid messing up cacheing
